Package com.adidas.connect.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateAccount
    Creates a new user.
    CreateLightAccount
    Performs a Create light account (createSubscription endpoint)
    CreateSubscription
    Create subscription action.
    DeleteAccount
    Action to delete account.
    EmailLookUp
    Action to look up emails registered in SCV.
    HandleResetPassword
    This service is basically intended for generating a token to reset the password via Forgot password function in various client applications.
    LookUpAccount
    LookUpAccount request.
    ResetPasswordAction
    Perform a reset Password request
    SCVAction<Result>
    Base class for all actions that act against SCV endpoints.
    SCVAuthAction<Result>
    Base class for those SCV api calls returning authentication info as CreateAccount or ResetPassword
    UpdateAccount
    Action to update account information.
